replies.body: mf support is good. going full ap is also good. the E damage is pretty high with liandries. also fantastic for clearing wave seiging and counter sieging

Her ultimate doesn't scale with AP, Munich. It's not enough damage late game to make it worthwhile.  What if MF supp built rageblade along with one other full damage item?  (I notice ROX built a Mortal Reminder for the Olaf, Ekko, etc. but it could be replaced by another secondary damage item like duskblade or ghostblade perhaps?).

It does actually scale with AP:
http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/missfortune/
Don't forget that her Q does too.

Her Double Up may scale with AP, but if you read more closely, it says Physical Damage underneath it.  If you play MF with this build http://prntscr.com/cxewfq , you'll notice that her double up does not do the insane amounts of damage it normally would if you built full damage and crit. 

Geez Riot made a complicated game. Whoever thinks this game is easy and/or simple has GOT to have an IQ of over 200. (FYI my IQ is 97 and I'm 23. :/ )

Sounds like you don't understand how these scalings work but perhaps you worded it poorly? If an ability has a scaling of either type it will do increased damage based on that % bonus regardless of the final result damage being. For example: If Kat's ult scaled the same amount off AD as it did AP, having 320 AP would still have the same result as 320 AD. Either way the ultimate would still do magic damage.
The issue is with penetration. Magic Pen items (aside from SOrc Shoes) are AP. Physical Pen Items are AD.
her ultimate does scale with AP but terribly low and the dmg is AD so it turns out to be kinda meh dmg.

This is why in ROX vs SKT, both games MF picked up the AP starting item for a little extra damage, finished it into the sightstone combination (I forget the name) and then immediately transitioned into a Mortal Reminder and a BC. This is actually a fairly potent combination; it gives her strong early game damage, and when she finishes MR and BC she does very decent team fight damage and cuts healing for everyone she hits. The MR was started with an EC to help cut the Ekko, Olaf and ADC healing that game.

But please, don't play this in solo queue unless you know why it is good. Specifically, it's good against Zyra because her E has similar range to Zyra E and MF can get a full ult channel off before the ult of Zyra R goes off.

Also build Liandry's then put in Rageblade. And you'll discover she isn't so bad. 

Basically if you are a god or not a n00b, mind you everyone but Faker belongs in bronze. 
You'll do excellent with Ap mf, she's pretty good. Really pretty good,  actually good,  good.

Too late, im trying this already
Tell us how it goes. Preferably with an end game screen.

MF support will NEVER work in solo queue.  You have to duo queue with your ADC and preferably play with an entire 5 premade.  I'm bronze 5 and even I realize how terrible MF support would be in solo queue. 

I for one am heavily in favor of tank Vi top seeing as I forced a jungler to camp my lane in my last four games with it.  (Ignore the fact that I got overly aggressive late game and ended up feeding. Vi's early game damage is on par with bloody Riven and that's where all my early solo kills came from. -,-)
The only reason they picked it was to out range the zyra. Literally no other reason. Its so conditional its not even worth picking up.
And to synergize with the Ashe arrow.  She is only worth picking when your ADC picks Ashe and they have a Zyra/Cait botlane.  Even then there are champs that outclass her.
what if the enemy locks in zyra tho?

It's really not that hard to play. It's just like playing with a Vel'koz support for example. Better yet MF has zero difficult skillshots. It's ranged and it packs some damage; the ult packs some very respectable level 6 or 11 damage.

The reason they played it versus the Zyra is that she's immobile and squishy AND MF's instant long range aoe slow sets up the Ashe arrow easily with basically no counterplay. Then the MF ult wipes their hp away so the other side basically can't contest lane because they have a squishy support that can't go near.

IDK why they didn't think to try a Braum pick but I guess they still took the series
Vel brings hard CC to the table, MF doesn't. Don't bring my favorite flying eyeball into this.
i just got one last game and it was shit. she couldnt peel, she took my cs, she couldnt do any bloody damage.
It's funny because I used to get flamed a lot for going MF support in normals. People dodging left and right or yelling at me not to pick her.

That may be true, but it implies people actually want to play support

Note: I am a "fill" main and yes I'm salty about rito's role selection process.

I don't mind much.
Having the meta slap me in the face every game is kinda shocking.
I like when things are shaken up a bit.

A funny thing is, Ashe would brobably be a better support. It actually list her as support in the game and her cc isn't too bad either.
HEY HEY im a support main, i can do what i want ._. support MF is something i dont do since i rather play other champs.
the only reason they pull it off was because skt didnt had any reliable way to stop miss fortune ulti, also she didnt build as much ap as she did ad right after so hardly an ap miss fortune

@Greymoore :  

http://prntscr.com/cxewfq  << My first try at MF support. We won a 4v5.   I solo queue picked MF into Ashe bot lane and we had first tower gold 6 minutes in versus Jinx/Thresh. (Granted this is low ELO, but let me have my fun okay?! :'(   ).

IMHO, rylais and zhonya are a waste. You don't deal enough magic damage that you need the rylais snare and there was nothing you want to zhonya on the enemy team (except jinx rocket maybe). 

I'd get 2 CDR / Armour pen items instead- ghostbalde / mortal reminder.

as soon as i saw them lock that pick that was my first thought too 
I feel sorry for the adc's out there 

and to think i got flamed for galio supp yesterday probably by some meta sheep who wouldnt mind me playing mf supp today because "the pros did it"

Support AP MF -
{{item:3285}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3100}} {{item:2301}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3089}}

Support AD MF -
{{item:3071}} {{item:3156}} {{item:2301}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3147}}{{item:3033}}  is pretty much the same as armor pen MF, but with sightstone and generally rushing blackcleaver instead of duskblade or ghostblade...can still go ghostblade though if snowballing. If behind you are probably better off with black cleaver and last whisper.

Don't buy magic pen on AP MF... If you want pen, get a black cleaver. Even though your ult and Q scale with AP they do physical damage so you are better off going armor pen than magic pen.
good luck to everyone destroying these tryhard edgelords
